title: Confronting a dark past
itunes:title: Confronting a dark past
itunes:subtitle: Chris Bowlby explains how Germany has sought to come to terms with the legacy of Nazism. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
As we approach the 75th anniversary of the end of the Holocaust, historical broadcaster Chris Bowlby explains how Germany has sought to come to terms with the legacy of Nazism. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
